hero.title: VersionUP VR/AR Learning Platform
hero.subtitle: Transform education with immersive virtual reality experiences
hero.description: VersionUP is a VR/AR platform that allows users to learn and practice inside fully immersive 3D environments. It also includes an AI teacher/guide that explains everything the user sees and supports them step by step throughout the learning journey. VersionUP has the potential to transform both industry and education by making practical, hands-on training accessible anytime and anywhere — without the need for expensive physical equipment.
